message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than you realize. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950,000. This is a steal for something that will revolutionize your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. However, I am not able to meet your asking price of $950,000. I am willing to offer $850,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $850,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down a bit to $900,000. I'm confident this price reflects the immense potential this product holds for you.

I understand your position, Alice. While I respect the potential value of the product, I still feel that $850,000 represents a fair compromise. However, I am willing to reconsider if you can come down to $875,000.
